resources.string: Buzz Buddy lets you set customized vibration patterns for your various notifications. Whenever a notification arrives to your phone, Buzz Buddy will play back the pattern that you have set for that particular application. We promise that we do not collect any passwords, credit card numbers, or any other personal information. If you have any questions, don\'t hesitate to contact us at buzzbuddyapp@gmail.com
Tap the record button to begin recording your vibration pattern.
Tap anywhere on the screen to record your pattern.
You need to activate accessibility settings to use Buzz Buddy.
Patterns cannot last longer than 30 seconds
